description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, the application's root CSS, and the main App component. It then creates a React root and renders the App component within StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React app into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM at the specified root.
